thread.title: EastEnders spoiler: Ian Beale to be diagnosed with prostate cancer after frequent toilet trips?
thread.title_full: EastEnders spoiler: Ian Beale to be diagnosed with prostate cancer after frequent toilet trips?

author: Hayley Minn
title: EastEnders spoiler: Ian Beale to be diagnosed with prostate cancer after frequent toilet trips?
text:
Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
EastEnders legend Ian Beale hasn’t had a good time of it recently, with his wife Jane Beale paralysed after she was pushed down the stairs by his killer son Bobby Beale, 
But it looks like the Albert Square stalwart - played by Adam Woodyatt - could be about to have even more bad news in the form of cancer. 
EastEnders viewers have started to wonder whether the BBC soap is about to give their only original cast member left prostate cancer. 
It comes after they noticed his visits to the toilet were becoming much more frequent. Read More Is Ian set for heartache? (Photo: BBC) 
Their suspicions were raised even further when he later fell asleep at the bar. 
Aunt Babe accused him of being drunk – but it seems it could actually be due to something much more serious. 
Is Ian about to get some deeply saddening news? 
One viewer said: “Ian Beale at the loo 3 times during the night. Cue predictable prostate cancer storyline. #eastenders Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
